ai-tha-ap426:0.3_0: The Elders made a flower for seven months
ai-tha-ap426:1.4_0: they dwelt in the seven Buddhas.
ai-tha-ap426:2.1_0: Seeing the flowering tree with a beautiful flower,
ai-tha-ap426:2.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap426:3.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap426:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap426:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap426:6.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap426:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ambaṭṭha.
ai-tha-ap426:9.1_0: he constructed the Seven Elders, the fourth Elder Tissa Rakusandha,
